entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -38.7°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
